mapper.select: select a.*,b.TXN_REQ_SSN,b.TXN_REQ_TM,b.ORIG_TXN_REQ_SSN,b.ORIG_TXN_REQ_TM,b.PROD_ID,b.TXN_TYPE from TPAM_WECHAT_TXN_INFO a left join PAGY_TXN_INFO b on a.pagy_txn_ssn=b.pagy_txn_ssn where to_char(a.PAGY_TXN_TM,'YYYYMMDD')= #{settleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.PAGY_RESP_CODE in ('0000','0002','0020','0011')
